Docs.param: Marks the extent of the data that has been successfully processed.
Docs.summary: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data.
Docs.remarks: The memory for the consumed data will be released and no longer available. The examined data communicates to the pipeline when it should signal more data is available.
